Text: Homosexuality is an abomination to Almighty God! Rejecting God and His Word is no laughing matter. Repent of this behavior or face eternity in the Lake of Fire. God wants all to call upon the Holy name of Jesus and be saved. First acknowledge that you are a sinner and ask for forgiveness. Believe that Jesus died for your sins on the cross. Then confess that Jesus is Lord. Refuse and be seperated from God forever. You have been warned.
My god fucked your god's mom.
